name: Defender (38)
description: Standard-issue, well-balanced combat rifle.

name: Elemental Rage (61)
description: Upgraded Defender: Standard-issue Freelancer rifle.
special: Veteran's Furor: Hitting Elite enemies increases all elemental damage by 5% for 10 seconds. Stacks to 20.

name: Elemental Rage (75)
description: Upgraded Defender: Standard-issue Freelancer rifle.
special: Veteran's Furor: Hitting Elite enemies increases all elemental damage by 5% for 10 seconds. Stacks to 20.

name: Hammerhead (38)
description: Greatest striking power, but lowest rate of fire in the assault rifle class.

name: Ralner's Blaze (61)
description: Upgraded Hammerhead: Hardest hitter in assault class.
special: Ignites the target while on a hit-streak (5).

name: Ralner's Blaze (75)
description: Upgraded Hammerhead: Hardest hitter in assault class.
special: Ignites the target while on a hit-streak (5).

name: Warden (38)
description: Four-round bursts enhance this rifle's ability to inflict damage.

name: Divine Vengeance (61)
description: Upgraded Warden: Fires four-shot bursts.
special: Every third weak point hit causes large fire explosions.

name: Divine Vengeance (75)
description: Upgraded Warden: Fires four-shot bursts.
special: Every third weak point hit causes large fire explosions.

name: Cloudburst (38)
description: Impressive rate of fire cuts down numerous targets quickly.

name: Fist of Stral (61)
description: Upgraded Cloudburst: Excellent rate of fire.
special: Striker's Fury: Hitting enemies increases weapon damage by 16% for 5 seconds. Stacks to 10.

name: Fist of Stral (75)
description: Upgraded Cloudburst: Excellent rate of fire.
special: Striker's Fury: Hitting enemies increases weapon damage by 16% for 5 seconds. Stacks to 10.

name: Mauler (38)
description: Lower relative rate of fire compensated by shells that deliver maximum damage.

name: The Last Stand (61)
description: Upgraded Mauler: Heaviest hitter of the autocannons.
special: Gambler's Wrath: When suit health declines, all weapon damage increases by 225% for 10 seconds.

name: The Last Stand (75)
description: Upgraded Mauler: Heaviest hitter of the autocannons.
special: Gambler's Wrath: When suit health declines, all weapon damage increases by 225% for 10 seconds.

name: Torrent (38)
description: Accuracy increases the longer you concentrate fire on a target. Consumes two ammo per shot.

name: Endless Siege (61)
description: Upgraded Torrent: Accuracy improves the longer you fire.
special: Base magazine size is increased by 100% and base damage is increased by 100%.

name: Endless Siege (75)
description: Upgraded Torrent: Accuracy improves the longer you fire.
special: Base magazine size is increased by 100% and base damage is increased by 100%.

name: Aftershock (38)
description: Payload sticks to enemy. Once it adheres to target—it detonates.

name: Sentinel's Vengeance (61)
description: Upgraded Aftershock: Grenade sticks to the enemy.
special: Detonates an area acid effect on a small hit-streak.

name: Sentinel's Vengeance (75)
description: Upgraded Aftershock: Grenade sticks to the enemy.
special: Detonates an area acid effect on a small hit-streak.

name: Bombardier (38)
description: Grenades skip before exploding, enhancing effective range.

name: Insult And Injury (61)
description: Upgraded Bombardier: Grenades bounce before exploding.
special: Victor's Bulwark: Defeating an enemy clears harmful status effects and boosts effect resistance by 75% for 10 seconds.

name: Insult And Injury (75)
description: Upgraded Bombardier: Grenades bounce before exploding.
special: Victor's Bulwark: Defeating an enemy clears harmful status effects and boosts effect resistance by 75% for 10 seconds.

name: Lurker (38)
description: Ability to manually detonate grenades instead of tight-aiming. Allows grenades to function like mines.

name: Balm Of Gavinicus (61)
description: Upgraded Lurker: Manually detonates mines instead of tight-aiming.
special: Hitting 2 enemies restores 25% armor.

name: Balm Of Gavinicus (75)
description: Upgraded Lurker: Manually detonates mines instead of tight-aiming.
special: Hitting 2 enemies restores 25% armor.

name: Barrage (38)
description: Crushing rate of fire allows for the most bullets in the least amount of time.

name: Close Encounter (61)
description: Upgraded Barrage: Delivers an excellent rate of fire.
special: Scout's Fury: Dashing increases weapon damage by 125% for 10 seconds.

name: Close Encounter (75)
description: Upgraded Barrage: Delivers an excellent rate of fire.
special: Scout's Fury: Dashing increases weapon damage by 125% for 10 seconds.

name: Blastback (38)
description: Handgun packing devastating strike force.

name: Avenging Herald (61)
description: Upgraded Blastback: Handgun with solid striking force.
special: Raptor's Deadeye: Hovering increases weapon damage by 200%.

name: Avenging Herald (75)
description: Upgraded Blastback: Handgun with solid striking force.
special: Raptor's Deadeye: Hovering increases weapon damage by 200%.

name: Resolution (38)
description: 1-2 punch with a dramatic striking force.

name: Glorious Result (61)
description: Upgraded Resolution: Fires a forceful, one-two punch.
special: Gunslinger's Fury: Hitting (2) enemy weak points quickly increases all weapon damage by 150% for 5 seconds.

name: Glorious Result (75)
description: Upgraded Resolution: Fires a forceful, one-two punch.
special: Gunslinger's Fury: Hitting (2) enemy weak points quickly increases all weapon damage by 150% for 5 seconds.

name: Havoc (38)
description: Fastest-firing weapon in the light machine gun class.

name: Renewed Courage (61)
description: Upgraded Havoc: Fastest rate of fire in class.
special: Last shot reduces recoil by -50% for the next 20 seconds. Stacks to 2.

name: Renewed Courage (75)
description: Upgraded Havoc: Fastest rate of fire in class.
special: Last shot reduces recoil by -50% for the next 20 seconds. Stacks to 2.

name: Relentless (38)
description: Versatile delivery of a high rate of fire and solid damage capability.

name: Artinia's Gambit (61)
description: Upgraded Relentless: Most balanced gun in its class.
special: When reloading, detonates a Combo explosion on primed targets in the immediate area.

name: Artinia's Gambit (75)
description: Upgraded Relentless: Most balanced gun in its class.
special: When reloading, detonates a Combo explosion on primed targets in the immediate area.

name: Sledgehammer (38)
description: Heaviest, but slowest hitter in light machine gun class.

name: Cycle Of Pain (61)
description: Upgraded Sledgehammer: Slower rate of fire with best striking power.
special: Weak point hits increase weapon rate of fire by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks to 10.

name: Cycle Of Pain (75)
description: Upgraded Sledgehammer: Slower rate of fire with best striking power.
special: Weak point hits increase weapon rate of fire by 10% for 10 seconds. Stacks to 10.

name: Fulcrum (38)
description: Fires at a terrific rate. Even, balanced submachine gun.

name: Unending Battle (61)
description: Upgraded Fulcrum: High rate of fire and decent striking power.
special: Striker's Savagery: Hitting an enemy at point-blank range increases weapon and melee damage by 135% for 5 seconds

name: Unending Battle (75)
description: Upgraded Fulcrum: High rate of fire and decent striking power.
special: Striker's Savagery: Hitting an enemy at point-blank range increases weapon and melee damage by 135% for 5 seconds

name: Hailstorm (38)
description: Greatest rate of fire and least accurate of all machine pistols.

name: Vassa's Surprise (61)
description: Upgraded Hailstorm: The least accurate machine pistol, but also the fastest.
special: On a melee hit, gain 100% ammo in the magazine.

name: Vassa's Surprise (75)
description: Upgraded Hailstorm: The least accurate machine pistol, but also the fastest.
special: On a melee hit, gain 100% ammo in the magazine.

name: Trajector (38)
description: Greater range, but slightly lower rate of fire than the Fulcrum.

name: Retaliation of Garretus (61)
description: Upgraded Trajector: Longer range with lower rate of fire.
special: Gambler's Wrath: When suit health declines, weapon damage increases by 400% for 10 seconds.

name: Retaliation of Garretus (75)
description: Upgraded Trajector: Longer range with lower rate of fire.
special: Gambler's Wrath: When suit health declines, weapon damage increases by 400% for 10 seconds.

name: Anvil (38)
description: Hits hard with an impressive rate of fire.

name: Soothing Touch (61)
description: Upgraded Anvil: Hits hard, with a slight kickback.
special: Striker's Balance: Hits reduce recoil by -30%. Stacks to 3 for 10 seconds.

name: Soothing Touch (75)
description: Upgraded Anvil: Hits hard, with a slight kickback.
special: Striker's Balance: Hits reduce recoil by -30%. Stacks to 3 for 10 seconds.

name: Guardian (38)
description: Delivers a powerful three-shot burst.

name: Death From Above (61)
description: Upgraded Guardian: Delivers a powerful three-shot burst.
special: Raptor's Sense: While hovering, increases weak point damage by 235.00%.

name: Death From Above (75)
description: Upgraded Guardian: Delivers a powerful three-shot burst.
special: Raptor's Sense: While hovering, increases weak point damage by 235.00%.

name: Scout (38)
description: Forceful striking power from an advantageous distance.

name: Thunderbolt of Yvenia (61)
description: Upgraded Scout: Basic semi-automatic rifle.
special: Has a 33% chance to deal large electric damage.

name: Thunderbolt of Yvenia (75)
description: Upgraded Scout: Basic semi-automatic rifle.
special: Has a 33% chance to deal large electric damage.

name: Constrictor (38)
description: Hold down trigger and sight focus more sharply, increasing accuracy.

name: Radiant Fortress (61)
description: Upgraded Constrictor: Holding the trigger focuses the sight.
special: Hitting (8) shots in a single burst recharges shields by 35%.

name: Radiant Fortress (75)
description: Upgraded Constrictor: Holding the trigger focuses the sight.
special: Hitting (8) shots in a single burst recharges shields by 35%.

name: Scattershot (38)
description: Knockdown power with a moderate amount of ammunition.

name: Papa Pump (61)
description: Upgraded Scattershot: Standard-issue lancer shotgun.
special: Reloading increases force and delivers bonus damage of 100% for 15 seconds. Stacks to 2

name: Papa Pump (75)
description: Upgraded Scattershot: Standard-issue lancer shotgun.
special: Reloading increases force and delivers bonus damage of 100% for 15 seconds. Stacks to 2

name: Vengeance (38)
description: Highest rate of fire in the shotgun class. Two shell bursts amplify power.

name: Rolling Carnage (61)
description: Upgraded Vengeance: Two-shell bursts hit hard.
special: Scout's Advantage: Dashing increases this weapon's damage by 83.3% for 20 seconds. Stacks to 3.

name: Rolling Carnage (75)
description: Upgraded Vengeance: Two-shell bursts hit hard.
special: Scout's Advantage: Dashing increases this weapon's damage by 83.3% for 20 seconds. Stacks to 3.

name: Deadeye (38)
description: Accurate targeting from a long distance.

name: Wyvern Blitz (61)
description: Upgraded Deadeye: Solid, balanced long-range rifle.
special: Raptor's Sense: Hovering while firing increases weapon weak point damage by 185%.

name: Wyvern Blitz (75)
description: Upgraded Deadeye: Solid, balanced long-range rifle.
special: Raptor's Sense: Hovering while firing increases weapon weak point damage by 185%.

name: Devastator (38)
description: Ammunition explodes on contact with target—limited ammo.

name: Truth Of Tarsis (61)
description: Upgraded Devastator: Ammunition explodes on contact.
special: Hitting weak points on enemies under a status effect will set off a chain combo.

name: Truth Of Tarsis (75)
description: Upgraded Devastator: Ammunition explodes on contact.
special: Hitting weak points on enemies under a status effect will set off a chain combo.

name: Whirlwind (38)
description: Hybrid between sniper and assault rifle.

name: Siege Breaker (61)
description: Upgraded Whirlwind: Combination of assault and sniper rifles.
special: On a hit-streak (3), shots freeze the target.

name: Siege Breaker (75)
description: Upgraded Whirlwind: Combination of assault and sniper rifles.
special: On a hit-streak (3), shots freeze the target.
